roleset.name: to loosen, wear away

example.name: fray-v: passive
example.text: Its relationship with parent General Electric Co. had been frayed [*]since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago .
example.arg: Its relationship with parent General Electric Co.
[*]since a big Kidder insider-trading scandal two years ago

example.name: fray-v: intransitive
example.text: But the build-up of S& P futures sell orders weighed on the market , and the link with stocks began [*] to fray again .

roleset.note: FRAY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fray' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from fray.01-v predicate notes)
